#summary 010. Installation instructions.

The installation involves two steps:
  # Copy the Python library in your application source - [http://code.google.com/p/appengine-profiler/source/browse/trunk/INSTALL review the INSTALL file] in the SVN repository.
  # Modify your application's code, so that you enable the profilers - review the documentation of each profiler in the Wiki for detailed instructions and examples.
